document_data.name: Double Dragon Gambling Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Double Dragon Gambling Hall''' was a secret, invitation only, gambling den located in the [[Shou]] district of [[Xiousing]] in [[Marsember]].  The entrance to the Double Dragon was through a curtain in the Shrine of [[Tymora]].  The ground floor was reserved for common patrons while wealthy patrons were invited to game at the high stakes games on the top floor.[[Dan Anderson]]. "Backdrop: Xiousing." ''[[Dungeon (magazine)|Dungeon]]'' #195. Renton, WA: Wizards of the Coast, October 2011.
document_data.Patrons: The Double Dragon's patrons included Shou [[Purple Dragons]], members of the [[Nine Golden Swords]] and many merchants.
